question: 奥底
sourceMnemonic: Something is in the <kanji>interior</kanji> AND the <kanji>bottom</kanji>? Why, it's in the very <vocabulary>depths</vocabulary>! And if it's in the interior and bottom of you, then it's at the <vocabulary>bottom</vocabulary> of your heart!
sourceReadingMnemonic: The readings for this word are both kun'yomi readings. You learned them when you learned the kanji, so you should be able to read this on your own.
